cn:
反应堆。反应的步骤：
1.与反应图案匹配的原子被消除
2.原子下落
3.用随机原子填充反应堆
4.若没有任何原子消除，反应停止。否则重复1-4步
en:
Reactor. The steps of the reaction:
1. The atoms matching the reaction pattern are eliminated
2. Atoms fall
3. Fill the reactor with random atoms
4. If no atoms are eliminated, the reaction stops. Otherwise, repeat steps 1-4
Set the speed of reaction animation

cn:
所有反应结构
注意：
1.反应的顺序并不会影响最终结果。
2.必须位置颜色完全匹配才会消除。不计旋转与翻转匹配
en:
All reaction structures
Note:
1. The order of reactions does not affect the final result.
2. The position and color must match completely to be eliminated. No rotation or flip matching is counted.

cn: 统计包含指定颜色的反应数
en: Count the number of reactions containing the specified color

cn: 统计颜色的各个位置频率
en: Count the frequency of each position of the color

cn: 本次任务已积累的能量
en: The energy accumulated in this task
The energy produced in the preview mode

cn: 你持有的金钱。进行操作消耗金钱。通过完成任务获取。
en: The money you have. Operations consume money. Obtain by completing tasks.

cn: 你持有的保险数。当能量超过安全阈值时，持有保险不会使游戏立即结束。
en: The number of insurance you have. When the energy exceeds the safe threshold, holding insurance will not end the game immediately.

cn: 跳过后，本次添加所需费用不增长
en: If skip, the cost of this purchase will not increase.

cn: 从随机三个反应中选择一个添加。添加后，本回合添加费用+1
en: Choose one from three random reactions to add, and the cost of adding this round +1 after adding

cn: 移除添加的上一个反应
en: Remove the last reaction added this round

cn: 提高安全范围。但是相应的，获取最高报酬的难度也增加\n使用后本回合费用增加1倍
en: Expand the safe range. However, the difficulty of getting the highest reward also increases.\nThe cost of this round increases by 100% after use

cn: 开始反应并获取能量，一旦生产开始，直到无法反应才会停止。\n使用后本回合费用+1
en: Start the reaction and get energy, once the production starts, it will not stop until it cannot react.\n The cost of this round +1 after use

cn: 预览反应情况。不会收集预览添加的能量，因此也不用担心爆了。\n使用后本回合费用+1
en: Preview the reaction. The energy added by the preview will not be collected, so don't worry about the engine crashing. \n The cost of this round +1 after use

cn: 提交能量，完成任务，获得对应的金钱
en: Submit energy, complete the task, and get the corresponding money.

cn: 表示任务所需能量和安全范围的曲线
en: Graph of the energy required and the safe range of the task

cn: 完成任务所需的最低能量
en: The minimum energy required to complete the task

cn: 安全阈值，超过这个值会爆炸
en: The safe threshold, exceeding this value will explode

cn: 完成任务至少能获得的金钱
en: The minimum money you can get for completing the task

cn: 完成任务最多能获得的金钱
en: The maximum money you can get for completing the task

cn: 此时提交能量所获得的金钱
en: The money obtained by submitting energy at this time

cn: 彻底爆了！\n（提示：避免添加过多反应。当你不确定时，多使用预览）
en: Boom!\n(Tip: Avoid adding too many reactions. When you are not sure, use preview mode)

cn: 你没有足够的金钱生产
en: You don't have enough money to produce.

cn: 增加{color}，基础费用增加，反应炉尺寸扩大至{size}格
en: Add {color}, the reactor size is expanded to {size}

cn: 爆了！\n你的能量超过了安全阈值{safe}，好在有保险保护\n本次生产无效
en: Boom!\nYour energy has exceeded the safe threshold {safe}, but you have insurance to protect you.\nThis production is invalid.

cn: 适合新手，各种资源充足，任务容易完成
资源较多，任务较容易完成
每个回合都有特殊情况\n资源较少，任务较难完成
en: Special situations in each round\nFewer resources, harder tasks

cn: 每个回合都有特殊情况\n任务更难完成\n但作者是可以通关这个难度的！
en: Special situations in each round\nVery few resources, very hard tasks\nBut the author can pass this difficulty!
The probability of generating {color} increases by 100%

cn: 奇数列生成{color}的概率增加2倍
en: The probability of generating {color} in odd columns increases by 200%

cn: 第{column}列生成{color}的概率增加5倍
en: The probability of generating {color} in column {column} increases by 500%
The size of the reactor is increased to {size}
The size of the reactor is reduced to {size}

cn: 生产花费更多金钱，但是预览花费的金钱降低
en: Production costs more money, but the cost of previewing is reduced

cn: 任务最低要求能量提高
en: The minimum energy required for the task is increased
